programme.title: Up & Adams
programme.desc: Kay Adams and a rotating roster of current and former players discuss the biggest storylines in the NFL.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: In the Bahamas, the prestigious $10k PCA Main Event is playing down to the final two tables. Ramon Colillas and Noah Boeken are among the pros still in the running for the trophy and $1.5m first prize.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: Just 16 players remain from almost a thousand entries at the PCA Main Event. Accomplished American Pro, Jonathan Little hopes to use his experience to make the Final Table and take a shot at the $1.5m first prize.

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: Challenger Alex Currie tries to get the better of his poker heroes at the cash tables in Monte Carlo. But will he be able to bluff EPT champion Jake Cody?

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: At the Monte Carlo cash game, with thousands of Euros in play, online legend Randy Lew takes a seat at the table, and finds the live arena tougher than expected.

programme.title: PokerStars
programme.desc: With only a few hands left to play in Monte Carlo, Challenger Alex Currie is starting to feel the pressure, as he aims to win money from Jake Cody and Jaime Staples.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: Las Vegas hosts the return of a game classic: the Big Game gives an amateur their shot at the poker experience of a lifetime, competing for life-changing money against pros and celebrities, including Phil Hellmuth and Jennifer Tilly.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: The second session of the Big Game is all action, with hundreds of thousands of dollars on the table; "The Poker Brat" Phil Hellmuth finally gets involved, and the amateur "Loose Cannon" tries her best to push his buttons.

programme.title: Up & Adams

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: The game continues in Las Vegas, with more than a million dollars now on the table; entrepreneur Alan Keating continues to drive the action, determined to play every single hand, and make big moves.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: It's the final session of this game in Vegas, and the last chance for the amateur "Loose Cannon" to make a profit; Hollywood actors Arden Cho and Jennifer Tilly play a hand worth $400,000.
